testsuite.system-out:

+++ testOption 10:57:20.757 [Test worker] INFO org.audiveris.omr.CLI - CLI args: [-option, omr.toto : totoValue, -option, omr.ui.tata=tataValue, -option, keyWithNoValue, -option, myKey : my value]
+++ testRun 10:57:20.759 [Test worker] INFO org.audiveris.omr.CLI - CLI args: [-run, org.audiveris.omr.step.RunClass]
+++ testRunError 10:57:20.762 [Test worker] INFO org.audiveris.omr.CLI - CLI args: [-run, fooBar] java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: fooBar java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: fooBar
+++ testStep 10:57:20.763 [Test worker] INFO org.audiveris.omr.CLI - CLI args: [-step, PAGE]
+++ printUsage 10:57:20.917 [Test worker] INFO org.audiveris.omr.CLI - AudiverisTest Version: 5.1.0
Syntax: audiveris [OPTIONS] [--] [INPUT_FILES]
@file: Content of file to be extended in line
Options: -annotate : (advanced) Annotate book symbols (default: false) -batch : Run with no graphic user interface (default: false) -export : Export MusicXML (default: false) -force : Force step/transcribe re-processing (default: false) -help : Display general help then stop (default: false) -option key=value : Define an application constant -output <output-folder> : Define base output folder -print : Print out book (default: false) -run <qualified-class-name> : (advanced) Run provided class on valid sheets -sample : (advanced) Sample all book symbols (default: false) -save : Save book on every successful batch step (default: false) -sheets int[] : Select specific sheets numbers and ranges (like 2-5) -step [LOAD | BINARY | SCALE | GRID | : Define a specific target step HEADERS | STEM_SEEDS | BEAMS | LEDGERS | HEADS | STEMS | REDUCTION | CUE_BEAMS | TEXTS | MEASURES | CHORDS | CURVES | SYMBOLS | LINKS | RHYTHMS | PAGE] -transcribe : Transcribe whole book (default: false)
Input file extensions: .omr : book file (input/output) [any other] : image file (input)
Sheet steps are in order: LOAD : Load the sheet (gray) picture BINARY : Binarize the sheet picture SCALE : Compute sheet line thickness, interline, beam thickness GRID : Retrieve staff lines, barlines, systems & parts HEADERS : Retrieve Clef-Key-Time systems headers STEM_SEEDS : Retrieve stem thickness & seeds for stems BEAMS : Retrieve beams LEDGERS : Retrieve ledgers HEADS : Retrieve note heads & whole notes STEMS : Build stems connected to heads & beams REDUCTION : Reduce conflicts in heads, stems & beams CUE_BEAMS : Retrieve cue beams TEXTS : Call OCR on textual items MEASURES : Retrieve raw measures from groups of bar lines CHORDS : Gather notes heads into chords CURVES : Retrieve slurs, wedges & endings SYMBOLS : Retrieve fixed-shape symbols LINKS : Link and reduce symbols RHYTHMS : Handle rhythms within measures PAGE : Connect systems within page
+++ testSome 10:57:20.920 [Test worker] INFO org.audiveris.omr.CLI - CLI args: [-help, -batch, -sheets, 5 2, 3, -step, PAGE, myScript.xml, my Input.pdf]
